code: import React from'react';import{Breadcrumb,BreadcrumbItem}from'reactstrap';var getDisplayString=function getDisplayString(sub){var arr=sub.split("-");if(arr.length>1){return arr[0].charAt(0).toUpperCase()+arr[0].slice(1)+" "+arr[1].charAt(0).toUpperCase()+arr[1].slice(1);}else{return sub.charAt(0).toUpperCase()+sub.slice(1);}};var getUrlString=function getUrlString(path,sub,index){if(index===0){return'#/';}else{return'#/'+path.split(sub)[0]+sub;}};var ContainerHeader=function ContainerHeader(_ref){var title=_ref.title,match=_ref.match;var path=match.path.substr(1);var subPath=path.split('/');return React.createElement("div",{className:"page-heading d-sm-flex justify-content-sm-between align-items-sm-center"},React.createElement("h2",{className:"title mb-3 mb-sm-0"},title),React.createElement(Breadcrumb,{className:"mb-0",tag:"nav"},subPath.map(function(sub,index){return React.createElement(BreadcrumbItem,{active:subPath.length===index+1,tag:subPath.length===index+1?"span":"a",key:index,href:getUrlString(path,sub,index)},getDisplayString(sub));})));};export default ContainerHeader;
